channel.title: Hosting Servers!
channel.description: Yes i am going to host 5 servers at the max. I have them up almost all the time. I try never to turn my laptop off. so it should be up 12/7 u just need to let me change the port so people can connect. (if i dont you may goto diff server.) Post here then message me if interested
